english.segment1: (Verse). Glory and honor, wisdom and power. Grace and fury, splendor and might. O You are splendor and might. Matchless beauty, endless light
english.segment2: (Pre-Chorus 1). All heaven's ringing. All the angels are singing. All heaven's ringing. All the angels are singing
english.segment3: You are all I need. You're my everything. God almighty. God almighty
english.segment5: None compares to You. None compares to You. There is none like You. Holy, holy God almighty
english.segment6: (Pre-Chorus 2). All heaven's ringing. All the angels are singing. All heaven's ringing. We join in the singing
english.segment7: You are all we need. You're our everything. No one greater. No one higher
